name: PRABHAKAR PATIL EDUCATION SOCIETY

address: AT POST VESHVI GONDHALPADA, TALUKA ALIBAG

briefDescription: Prabhakar Patil Education Society (PNP Education Society) is one of the most well-known societies of Raigad District having established & registered in 2001 under Societies Registration Act (Maharashtra / 83 / 2000 (Raigad) & F-3373 Raigad & Bombay Public Trust Act (F-3373 (Raigad)] by inspiration of late Prabhakar Narayan Patil who was a great Social Worker in Raigad District. His work in the field of education is invaluable."Prabhakar Patil Education Society, Alibag, is working in a divine field of imparting education in remote areas of Raigad District since last 14 years having total 49, Marathi & English medium schools, colleges (recognized by govt. of Maharashtra, AICTE, DTE , affiliated to the SSC, CBSE & MSBTE boards)"
